lyrics.lyric: The End of the World
Why does the sun go on shining?
Why does the sea rush to shore?
Don't they know it's the end of the world?
lyrics.tlyric: 难道它们不知道这是世界末日吗？

lyrics.lyric: Cause you don't love me any more
Why do the birds go on singing?
Why do the stars glow above?
Don't they know it's the end of the world?
lyrics.tlyric: 难道它们不知道这是世界末日吗？

lyrics.lyric: It ended when I lost your love
lyrics.tlyric: 当我失去你的爱时，一切都结束了

lyrics.lyric: I wake up in the morning and I wonder
lyrics.tlyric: 当我清晨醒来我会纳闷

lyrics.lyric: Why everything is the same as it was
I can't understand, no, I can't understand
lyrics.tlyric: 我无法理解，不，我无法理解

lyrics.lyric: How life goes on the way it does
Why does my heart go on beating?
Why do these eyes of mine cry?
Don't they know it's the end of the world?
lyrics.tlyric: 难道它们不知道这是世界末日吗？

lyrics.lyric: It ended when you said goodbye
lyrics.tlyric: 当你说再见时，一切都结束了

lyrics.lyric: Why does my heart go on beating?
Why do these eyes of mine cry?
Don't they know it's the end of the world?
lyrics.tlyric: 难道它们不知道这是世界末日吗？

lyrics.lyric: It ended when you said goodbye
lyrics.tlyric: 当你说再见时，一切都结束了

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Arthur Kent/Sylvia Dee
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Arthur Kent/Sylvia Dee
[00:07.380]Why does the sun go on shining?
[00:12.690]Why does the sea rush to shore?
[00:20.280]Don't they know it’s the end of the world?
[00:27.140]Cause you don't love me any more
[00:34.240]Why do the birds go on singing?
[00:41.040]Why do the stars glow above?
[00:47.590]Don't they know it’s the end of the world?
[00:54.290]It ended when I lost your love
[01:01.150]I wake up in the morning and I wonder
[01:08.000]Why everything is the same as it was
[01:14.850]I can't understand no I can't understand
[01:21.650]How life goes on the way it does
[01:28.800]Why does my heart go on beating?
[01:35.460]Why do these eyes of mine cry?
[01:42.410]Don't they know it’s the end of the world
[01:49.360]It ended when you said “good-bye”
[01:52.610]Why does my heart go on beating?
[02:03.260]Why do these eyes of mine cry?
[02:10.270]Don't they know it’s the end of the world?
[02:17.120]It ended when you said “good-bye”

tlyric.lyric:
[00:07.380]太阳为何依然照耀
[00:12.690]海浪为何拍打着岩岸
[00:20.280]难道它们不知道这是世界末日
[00:27.140]因为你不再爱我了
[00:34.240]鸟儿为何依然歌唱
[00:41.040]星星为何在天上闪耀
[00:47.590]难道它们不知道这是世界末日
[00:54.290]当我失去了你的爱，它就结束了
[01:01.150]当我清晨醒来纳闷着
[01:08.000]为何一切如常
[01:14.850]我无法了解，我真的无法了解
[01:21.650]生命怎会像往常一样运行
[01:28.800]我的心为何仍在跳动
[01:35.460]我的双眼为何在流泪
[01:42.410]难道它们不知道这是世界末日
[01:49.360]当你说再见的时候，它就结束了
[01:52.610]我的心为何仍在跳动
[02:03.260]我的双眼为何在流泪
[02:10.270]难道它们不知道这是世界末日
[02:17.120]当你说再见的时候，它就结束了
